Uruguay head coach Óscar Tabárez called Suárez "a great forward, an elite player among forwards in the world",<sup id="cite_ref-356" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-356">&#91;352&#93;</a></sup> and Liverpool coach Kenny Dalglish said, "he's intelligent, he's had a fantastic education at Ajax".<sup id="cite_ref-Rice_Dalglish_357-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Rice_Dalglish-357">&#91;353&#93;</a></sup> Former Liverpool striker <a href="/wiki/John_Aldridge" title="John Aldridge">John Aldridge</a> said his abilities allow him to get into a position to score and evade defenders.<sup id="cite_ref-Aldridge_page_3_358-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Aldridge_page_3-358">&#91;354&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Aldridge_page_2_359-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Aldridge_page_2-359">&#91;355&#93;</a></sup> Meanwhile Thierry Henry called Suárez the best striker in the world, stating, ""He has everything. He's in your face, he's arrogant- in a good way, he can volley it, he can score headers. He has vicious side to his game and I will not call it cheating. He knows how to score goals."<sup id="cite_ref-360" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-360">&#91;356&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Suárez has been praised for his <a href="/wiki/Work_rate" title="Work rate">work rate</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-Aldridge_page_3_358-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Aldridge_page_3-358">&#91;354&#93;</a></sup> and his quickness<sup id="cite_ref-Rice_Dalglish_357-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Rice_Dalglish-357">&#91;353&#93;</a></sup> that allows him to attack from the outside.<sup id="cite_ref-soccernet_stats_344-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-soccernet_stats-344">&#91;341&#93;</a></sup> Additionally, Suárez has a liking for often executing <a href="/wiki/Dummy_(football)" title="Dummy (football)">dummies</a> (going around the defenders with a fake-out) within his style of dribbling.<sup id="cite_ref-361" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-361">&#91;357&#93;</a></sup> During his time in Barcelona, he was known for constantly scoring through <a href="/wiki/Volley_(association_football)" title="Volley (association football)">volleys or half-volleys</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-362" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-362">&#91;358&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-363" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-363">&#91;359&#93;</a></sup>  Suárez also gained a reputation for consistently scoring acrobatic goals, often shooting off balance, or in air, or with overhead <a href="/wiki/Bicycle_kick" title="Bicycle kick">bicycle kicks</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-364" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-364">&#91;360&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-365" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-365">&#91;361&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-366" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-366">&#91;362&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>He also creates many scoring opportunities for his teammates with his vision and great passing abilities, as is reflected in his numbers of <a href="/wiki/Assist_(association_football)" title="Assist (association football)">assists</a>, among the very highest within the stat's recorded history.<sup id="cite_ref-367" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-367">&#91;363&#93;</a></sup> Former Liverpool captain, Steven Gerrard, lauded Suárez's unselfish playstyle within his autobiography, stating how that "It's a rare combination, to be a miraculous footballer who is willing to use his gifts to selflessly assist and create goals for a teammate", as well as further writing, "He scores goals. He creates goals. He's hard and horrible to play against. You've got a chance of beating anyone in the world with Luis Suárez in your team".<sup id="cite_ref-368" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-368">&#91;364&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Guardian_3-1_369-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Guardian_3-1-369">&#91;365&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>In addition to being a prolific player, Suárez has often been praised for his strong mentality and desire to win. Former Liverpool teammate, <a href="/wiki/Jordan_Henderson" title="Jordan Henderson">Jordan Henderson</a> dubbed Suárez as a "warrior", claiming that his attitude inspired confidence among his teammates.<sup id="cite_ref-370" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-370">&#91;366&#93;</a></sup> Meanwhile Gerrard eulogized his drive to succeed, stating "Luis played to win a five-a-side training session like he was chasing the Champions League or the World Cup. If his team lost a kickaround he went home angry; he always needed to win that badly".<sup id="cite_ref-Guardian_3-1_369-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Guardian_3-1-369">&#91;365&#93;</a></sup> Atletico Madrid Coach, <a href="/wiki/Diego_Simeone" title="Diego Simeone">Diego Simeone</a> hailed Suárez for the "desire and energy" he brought to the club.<sup id="cite_ref-371" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-371">&#91;367&#93;</a></sup> Suárez, himself, has stated that he's the kind of player who would "kill himself just to prevent a throw-in at the 90th minute." in his autobiography.<sup id="cite_ref-372" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-372">&#91;368&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Former Ajax coach <a href="/wiki/Marco_van_Basten" title="Marco van Basten">Marco van Basten</a> criticised Suárez for his tendency to receive yellow cards.<sup id="cite_ref-Echo_2-1_49-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Echo_2-1-49">&#91;46&#93;</a></sup> Van Basten said he had a tense relationship with Suárez,<sup id="cite_ref-Echo_2-1_49-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Echo_2-1-49">&#91;46&#93;</a></sup> although he conceded that "Luis is unpredictable, he's hard to influence but that makes him special."<sup id="cite_ref-Echo_2-1_49-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Echo_2-1-49">&#91;46&#93;</a></sup> At times, Suárez can be dominant but fail to convert his efforts into goals.<sup id="cite_ref-Hubbard_373-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Hubbard-373">&#91;369&#93;</a></sup> Despite his weaknesses, Suárez's leadership stood out to Ajax management.<sup id="cite_ref-Echo_2-4_74-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Echo_2-4-74">&#91;71&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Controversies">Controversies</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;action=edit&amp;section=33" title="Edit section: Controversies">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Suárez has been widely accused of <a href="/wiki/Diving_(association_football)" title="Diving (association football)">diving</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-377" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-377">&#91;note 5&#93;</a></sup> His manager, teammates and various analysts have commented that this reputation for simulation has caused referees not to award him legitimate penalties.<sup id="cite_ref-378" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-378">&#91;373&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-379" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-379">&#91;374&#93;</a></sup> In January 2013, Suárez admitted to diving against Stoke City in an October 2012 match. This led his manager Brendan Rodgers to comment his actions were "unacceptable" and that he would be dealt with "internally" by the club.<sup id="cite_ref-380" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-380">&#91;375&#93;</a></sup> During the 2018 World Cup game against Portugal, after collisions with Portuguese players, Suarez twice acted like he had a head injury despite Suarez's head not being touched.<sup id="cite_ref-381" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-381">&#91;376&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Suárez has received infamy for the multiple occasions he has bitten opponents. In a Group D matchup at the <a href="/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014 FIFA World Cup</a>, Suarez was shown to have bit Italian defender <a href="/wiki/Giorgio_Chiellini" title="Giorgio Chiellini">Giorgio Chiellini</a>, resulting in FIFA suspending Suarez from all football activities for 4 months. While playing for Liverpool, Suarez bit Chelsea player <a href="/wiki/Branislav_Ivanovi%C4%87" title="Branislav Ivanovi">Branislav Ivanovi</a> in a Premier League match, and was punished with a ten match ban. In an earlier incident while playing for <a href="/wiki/AFC_Ajax" title="AFC Ajax">AFC Ajax</a> he was caught biting <a href="/wiki/PSV_Eindhoven" title="PSV Eindhoven">PSV Eindhoven</a> player <a href="/wiki/Otman_Bakkal" title="Otman Bakkal">Otman Bakkal</a> and was suspended for seven games.<sup id="cite_ref-Gaines_112-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Gaines-112">&#91;109&#93;</a></sup> Suárez has also been accused of <a href="/wiki/Stomp_(strike)" title="Stomp (strike)">stamping</a> on opponents in the Premier League and the UEFA Europa League.<sup id="cite_ref-382" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-382">&#91;377&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-383" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-383">&#91;378&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-384" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-384">&#91;379&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-385" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-385">&#91;380&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Due to his diving, biting, stamping, and other antics, Suárez has been frequently labelled as a <a href="/wiki/Pest_(ice_hockey)" title="Pest (ice hockey)">pest</a> and a cheat.<sup id="cite_ref-386" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-386">&#91;381&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-387" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-387">&#91;382&#93;</a></sup> In December 2013, Spanish football website <i>El Gol Digital</i> ranked Suárez at fifth in its list of the world's dirtiest footballers.<sup id="cite_ref-388" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-388">&#91;383&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Media_and_sponsorship">Media and sponsorship</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;action=edit&amp;section=34" title="Edit section: Media and sponsorship">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:172px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG/170px-Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG" decoding="async" width="170" height="304" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG/255px-Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG/340px-Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG 2x" data-file-width="823" data-file-height="1473" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Suarez_training_Ajax.JPG" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Previously with Adidas, Suárez has been sponsored by <a href="/wiki/Puma_(brand)" title="Puma (brand)">Puma</a> since 2018. He wears Puma Future 2.1.</div></div></div>
<p>Suárez had a sponsorship deal with German sportswear and equipment supplier <a href="/wiki/Adidas" title="Adidas">Adidas</a>, before switching to rivals <a href="/wiki/Puma_(brand)" title="Puma (brand)">Puma</a> in 2018.<sup id="cite_ref-389" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-389">&#91;384&#93;</a></sup> Suárez starred in a 2014 advert for <a href="/wiki/Beats_Electronics" title="Beats Electronics">Beats</a> with other global football stars including Neymar and <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Thierry Henry</a>, with the theme of "The Game Before the Game" and the players' pre-game ritual of listening to music.<sup id="cite_ref-390" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-390">&#91;385&#93;</a></sup> In Uruguay, Suárez has also appeared in advertisements for Abitab, <a href="/wiki/Antel" class="mw-redirect" title="Antel">Antel</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cablevisi%C3%B3n_(Argentina)" title="Cablevisión (Argentina)">Cablevisión</a>, <a href="/wiki/Garnier" title="Garnier">Garnier</a>, <a href="/wiki/Pepsi" title="Pepsi">Pepsi</a> and <a href="/wiki/Samsung" title="Samsung">Samsung</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-391" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-391">&#91;386&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-392" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-392">&#91;387&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Suárez features in <a href="/wiki/EA_Sports" title="EA Sports">EA Sports</a>' <a href="/wiki/FIFA_(video_game_series)" title="FIFA (video game series)"><i>FIFA</i> video game series</a>: as a result of Suárez's ban for his bite on Giorgio Chiellini at the 2014 World Cup, players in <i><a href="/wiki/FIFA_15" title="FIFA 15">FIFA 15</a></i> were unable to select Suárez until his ban ended on 26 October.<sup id="cite_ref-393" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-393">&#91;388&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Active on social media, Suárez has <a href="/wiki/List_of_most-followed_Instagram_accounts" title="List of most-followed Instagram accounts">over 35 million Instagram followers</a> as of May 2020, the most for a person from Uruguay.<sup id="cite_ref-394" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-394">&#91;389&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-395" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-395">&#91;390&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personal_life">Personal life</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;action=edit&amp;section=35" title="Edit section: Personal life">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>Suárez was born in Salto, Uruguay to Sandra Diaz and Rodolfo Suárez, the fourth of seven boys.<sup id="cite_ref-Lyttleton_41-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Lyttleton-41">&#91;38&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Pearce_1-1_396-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Pearce_1-1-396">&#91;391&#93;</a></sup> His older brother, <a href="/wiki/Paolo_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paolo Suárez">Paolo Suárez</a>, is a retired professional footballer, who last played for <a href="/wiki/A.D._Isidro_Metap%C3%A1n" title="A.D. Isidro Metapán">Isidro Metapán</a> in El Salvador.
</p><p>Suárez moved with his family to <a href="/wiki/Montevideo,_Uruguay" class="mw-redirect" title="Montevideo, Uruguay">Montevideo</a> when he was seven, and his parents separated when he was nine.<sup id="cite_ref-Pearce_1-1_396-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Pearce_1-1-396">&#91;391&#93;</a></sup> In Montevideo, he developed his football skills on the streets,<sup id="cite_ref-personal_bio_38-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-personal_bio-38">&#91;35&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Pearce_1-1_396-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Pearce_1-1-396">&#91;391&#93;</a></sup> while also taking up work as a street sweeper at the age of 15.<sup id="cite_ref-ESPNportrait_37-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-ESPNportrait-37">&#91;34&#93;</a></sup> The contrast between his life in Europe and the poverty he left behind has been cited as contributing to his periodic aggression on the field, as well as being a possible explanation for the more forgiving attitudes of the Uruguayan public and press towards such cases, compared to Europe.<sup id="cite_ref-ESPNportrait_37-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-ESPNportrait-37">&#91;34&#93;</a></sup> Besides his native tongue, Suárez is able to speak <a href="/wiki/Dutch_language" title="Dutch language">Dutch</a> and English.<sup id="cite_ref-397" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-397">&#91;392&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-398" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-398">&#91;393&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/37/Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg/220px-Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="165" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/37/Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg/330px-Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/37/Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg/440px-Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg 2x" data-file-width="3264" data-file-height="2448" /></a>  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"><a href="/wiki/File:Mural_escuela_171_01.jpg" class="internal" title="Enlarge"></a></div>Mural of Suárez on his former school in Montevideo, Uruguay</div></div></div>
<p>Suárez is of <a href="/wiki/Multiracial" class="mw-redirect" title="Multiracial">mixed race</a>, with public records indicating his having a black grandfather.<sup id="cite_ref-399" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-399">&#91;394&#93;</a></sup> The matter of ethnicity was raised in reporting on the <a href="/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez#Racial_abuse_incident" title="Luis Suárez">Patrice Evra incident</a>, where use by his grandmother, Lila Piriz, of "<i>mi negrito</i>" as a sobriquet has been offered to explain Suárez's repeated use of "negro" over the two-minute altercation; the FA judged his evidence unreliable, issuing him an eight-match ban. His mother also supported the claim Suárez made that using the word was not racist in Uruguay. She said it was "normal", and that it was "a word people use with their friends. It's like calling someone fat, thin or whatever."<sup id="cite_ref-400" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-400">&#91;395&#93;</a></sup>
</p><p>Suárez began dating Sofía Balbi at age 15 in Montevideo; the Balbi family moved to <a href="/wiki/Barcelona" title="Barcelona">Barcelona</a> in 2003, and Suárez's focus on football strengthened as a result as he wanted to follow them to Europe to join Sofía again.<sup id="cite_ref-ESPNportrait_37-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-ESPNportrait-37">&#91;34&#93;</a></sup> Suárez married her in 2009, and the couple have a daughter named Delfina (born 2010) and two sons named Benjamin (born 2013) and Lauti (born 2018).<sup id="cite_ref-401" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-401">&#91;396&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Lyttleton_41-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Lyttleton-41">&#91;38&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-daughter_402-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-daughter-402">&#91;397&#93;</a></sup> He has a tattoo of his daughter's name Delfina on his wrist which he kisses as part of his <a href="/wiki/Goal_celebration" title="Goal celebration">goal celebration</a>  this celebration routine is featured in EA Sports video game <i><a href="/wiki/FIFA_15" title="FIFA 15">FIFA 15</a></i> as "Kiss The Wrist".<sup id="cite_ref-403" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-403">&#91;398&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-404" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-404">&#91;399&#93;</a></sup> In 2014, Suárez joined Barcelona, allowing him to live closer with Sofía's family. On the move, Suárez said, "[Liverpool] did all they could to get me to stay, but playing and living in Spain, where my wife's family live, is a lifelong dream and ambition. I believe now the timing is right."<sup id="cite_ref-405" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-405">&#91;400&#93;</a></sup> In 2014, Suárez released his autobiography, <i>Crossing the Line  My Story</i>.<sup id="cite_ref-406" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-406">&#91;401&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-407" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-407">&#91;402&#93;</a></sup> Suárez, who is married to an Italian citizen, flew to <a href="/wiki/Perugia" title="Perugia">Perugia</a> in September 2020, to do a B1 Italian language exam to gain Italian citizenship.<sup id="cite_ref-408" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-408">&#91;403&#93;</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Career_statistics">Career statistics</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;action=edit&amp;section=36" title="Edit section: Career statistics">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 2nd team: 2014, 2015, 2017<sup id="cite_ref-469" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-469">&#91;452&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-470" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-470">&#91;453&#93;</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-471" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-471">&#91;454&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 3rd team: 2018<sup id="cite_ref-472" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-472">&#91;455&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 4th team: 2013<sup id="cite_ref-473" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-473">&#91;456&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li>FIFA FIFPro World11 nominee: 2019 (7th forward)<sup id="cite_ref-474" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-474">&#91;457&#93;</a></sup></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/La_Liga_Player_of_the_Month" title="La Liga Player of the Month">La Liga Player of the Month</a>: May 2016, December 2017,<sup id="cite_ref-475" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-475">&#91;458&#93;</a></sup> October 2018, December 2019<sup id="cite_ref-476" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-476">&#91;459&#93;</a></sup></li></ul>

<li id="cite_note-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"/><cite id="CITEREFShaw2017" class="citation news cs1">Shaw, Chris (24 December 2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.liverpoolfc.com/news/announcements/285271-luis-suarez-celebrates-400-goal-landmark">"Luis Suarez celebrates 400-goal landmark"</a>. <i>Liverpool FC</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Pearce_1-4-45"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Pearce_1-4_45-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Pearce_1-4_45-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Pearce_1-4_45-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"/><cite id="CITEREFPearce2011" class="citation news cs1">Pearce, James (9 February 2011). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/liverpool-fc/lfc-player-profiles/luis-suarez/2011/02/09/luis-suarez-s-rise-from-the-streets-of-montevideo-to-liverpool-fc-hero-part-one-100252-28138725/4/">"Luis Suarez's rise from the streets of Montevideo to Liverpool FC hero  part one"</a>. <i>Liverpool Echo</i>. <li id="cite_note-233"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-233">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.fcbarcelona.com/en/news/1712073/luis-suarez-overtakes-kubala">"Luis Suárez overtakes Kubala"</a>. <i>fcbarcelona.com</i>. <li id="cite_note-Suarez_apology_Twitter-299"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Suarez_apology_Twitter_299-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Suarez_apology_Twitter_299-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"/><cite id="CITEREFSuárez2014" class="citation web cs1">Suárez, Luis (30 June 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140701015706/https://twitter.com/luis16suarez/status/483659463417548800">"Suárez's official apology"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Twitter" title="Twitter">Twitter</a>. <div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="South_American_Championship_/_Copa_América_Player_of_the_Tournament" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_MVP" href="/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="Copa América">South American Championship / Copa América</a> <a href="/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_records_and_statistics#General_statistics_by_tournament" title="Copa América records and statistics">Player of the Tournament</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">South American Nations Championship<br />Player of the tournament</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1916_South_American_Championship" title="1916 South American Championship">1916</a>: <a href="/wiki/Isabelino_Grad%C3%ADn" title="Isabelino Gradín">Gradín</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1917_South_American_Championship" title="1917 South American Championship">1917</a>: <a href="/wiki/H%C3%A9ctor_Scarone" title="Héctor Scarone">Scarone</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1919_South_American_Championship" title="1919 South American Championship">1919</a>: <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Friedenreich" title="Arthur Friedenreich">Friedenreich</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1920_South_American_Championship" title="1920 South American Championship">1920</a>: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Piendibene" title="José Piendibene">Piendibene</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1921_South_American_Championship" title="1921 South American Championship">1921</a>: <a href="/wiki/Am%C3%A9rico_Tesoriere" title="Américo Tesoriere">Tesoriere</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1922_South_American_Championship" title="1922 South American Championship">1922</a>: <a href="/wiki/Agostinho_Fortes_Filho" title="Agostinho Fortes Filho">Fortes</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1923_South_American_Championship" title="1923 South American Championship">1923</a>: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Nasazzi" title="José Nasazzi">Nasazzi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1924_South_American_Championship" title="1924 South American Championship">1924</a>: <a href="/wiki/Pedro_Petrone" title="Pedro Petrone">Petrone</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1925_South_American_Championship" title="1925 South American Championship">1925</a>: <a href="/wiki/Manuel_Seoane" title="Manuel Seoane">Seoane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1926_South_American_Championship" title="1926 South American Championship">1926</a>: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Leandro_Andrade" title="José Leandro Andrade">Andrade</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1927_South_American_Championship" title="1927 South American Championship">1927</a>: <a href="/wiki/Manuel_Seoane" title="Manuel Seoane">Seoane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1929_South_American_Championship" title="1929 South American Championship">1929</a>: <a href="/wiki/Manuel_Ferreira_(footballer)" title="Manuel Ferreira (footballer)">Ferreira</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1935_South_American_Championship" title="1935 South American Championship">1935</a>: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Nasazzi" title="José Nasazzi">Nasazzi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1937_South_American_Championship" title="1937 South American Championship">1937</a>: <a href="/wiki/Vicente_de_la_Mata" title="Vicente de la Mata">Mata</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1939_South_American_Championship" title="1939 South American Championship">1939</a>: <a href="/wiki/Teodoro_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Teodoro Fernández">Fernández</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1941_South_American_Championship" title="1941 South American Championship">1941</a>: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Livingstone" title="Sergio Livingstone">Livingstone</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1942_South_American_Championship" title="1942 South American Championship">1942</a>: <a href="/wiki/Obdulio_Varela" title="Obdulio Varela">Varela</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1945_South_American_Championship" title="1945 South American Championship">1945</a>: <a href="/wiki/Domingos_da_Guia" title="Domingos da Guia">da Guia</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1946_South_American_Championship" title="1946 South American Championship">1946</a>: <a href="/wiki/Adolfo_Pedernera" title="Adolfo Pedernera">Pedernera</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1947_South_American_Championship" title="1947 South American Championship">1947</a>: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Manuel_Moreno" title="José Manuel Moreno">Moreno</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1949_South_American_Championship" title="1949 South American Championship">1949</a>: <a href="/wiki/Ademir_de_Menezes" title="Ademir de Menezes">Ademir</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1953_South_American_Championship" title="1953 South American Championship">1953</a>: <a href="/wiki/Heriberto_Herrera" title="Heriberto Herrera">Herrera</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1955_South_American_Championship" title="1955 South American Championship">1955</a>: <a href="/wiki/Enrique_Hormaz%C3%A1bal" title="Enrique Hormazábal">Hormazábal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1956_South_American_Championship" title="1956 South American Championship">1956</a>: <a href="/wiki/%C3%93scar_M%C3%ADguez" title="Óscar Míguez">Míguez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1957_South_American_Championship" title="1957 South American Championship">1957</a>: <a href="/wiki/Omar_S%C3%ADvori" title="Omar Sívori">Sívori</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1959_South_American_Championship_(Argentina)" title="1959 South American Championship (Argentina)">1959 (Argentina)</a>: <a href="/wiki/Pel%C3%A9" title="Pelé">Pelé</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1959_South_American_Championship_(Ecuador)" title="1959 South American Championship (Ecuador)">1959 (Ecuador)</a>: <a href="/wiki/Alcides_Silveira" title="Alcides Silveira">Silveira</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1963_South_American_Championship" title="1963 South American Championship">1963</a>: <a href="/wiki/Ramiro_Blacut" title="Ramiro Blacut">Blacut</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1967_South_American_Championship" title="1967 South American Championship">1967</a>: <a href="/wiki/Pedro_Rocha" title="Pedro Rocha">Rocha</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Copa América<br />Player of the tournament</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1975_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1975 Copa América">1975</a>: <a href="/wiki/Te%C3%B3filo_Cubillas" title="Teófilo Cubillas">Cubillas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1979_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1979 Copa América">1979</a>: <a href="/wiki/Carlos_Caszely" title="Carlos Caszely">Caszely</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1983_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1983 Copa América">1983</a>: <a href="/wiki/Enzo_Francescoli" title="Enzo Francescoli">Francescoli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1987_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1987 Copa América">1987</a>: <a href="/wiki/Carlos_Valderrama" title="Carlos Valderrama">Valderrama</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1989_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1989 Copa América">1989</a>: <a href="/wiki/Rub%C3%A9n_Sosa" title="Rubén Sosa">Sosa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1991_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1991 Copa América">1991</a>: <a href="/wiki/Leonardo_Rodr%C3%ADguez" title="Leonardo Rodríguez">Rodríguez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1993_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1993 Copa América">1993</a>: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Goycochea" title="Sergio Goycochea">Goycochea</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1995_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1995 Copa América">1995</a>: <a href="/wiki/Enzo_Francescoli" title="Enzo Francescoli">Francescoli</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1997_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1997 Copa América">1997</a>: <a href="/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/1999_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1999 Copa América">1999</a>: <a href="/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2001_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2001 Copa América">2001</a>: <a href="/wiki/Amado_Guevara" title="Amado Guevara">Guevara</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2004_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2004 Copa América">2004</a>: <a href="/wiki/Adriano_(footballer,_born_1982)" title="Adriano (footballer, born 1982)">Adriano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2007_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2007 Copa América">2007</a>: <a href="/wiki/Robinho" title="Robinho">Robinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2011_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2011 Copa América">2011</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2015_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2015 Copa América">2015</a>: <s><a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></s></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_Centenario" title="Copa América Centenario">2016</a>: <a href="/wiki/Alexis_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Alexis Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2019_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2019 Copa América">2019</a>: <a href="/wiki/Dani_Alves" title="Dani Alves">Alves</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:Dutch Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Dutch Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Dutch_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Dutch Footballer of the Year">Dutch Footballer of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1984: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_Gullit" title="Ruud Gullit">Gullit</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Marco_van_Basten" title="Marco van Basten">Van Basten</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1986: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_Gullit" title="Ruud Gullit">Gullit</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1987: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Koeman" title="Ronald Koeman">Koeman</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Koeman" title="Ronald Koeman">Koeman</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1990: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jan_Wouters" title="Jan Wouters">Wouters</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Dennis_Bergkamp" title="Dennis Bergkamp">Bergkamp</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Dennis_Bergkamp" title="Dennis Bergkamp">Bergkamp</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Finland" title="Finland"><img alt="Finland" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/15px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/23px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bc/Flag_of_Finland.svg/30px-Flag_of_Finland.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1800" data-file-height="1100" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jari_Litmanen" title="Jari Litmanen">Litmanen</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronald_de_Boer" title="Ronald de Boer">De Boer</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belgium" title="Belgium"><img alt="Belgium" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Luc_Nilis" title="Luc Nilis">Nilis</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronald_de_Boer" title="Ronald de Boer">De Boer</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jaap_Stam" title="Jaap Stam">Stam</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mark_van_Bommel" title="Mark van Bommel">Van Bommel</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Pierre_van_Hooijdonk" title="Pierre van Hooijdonk">Van Hooijdonk</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Serbia" title="Serbia"><img alt="Serbia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mateja_Ke%C5%BEman" title="Mateja Keman">Keman</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Maxwell_(footballer,_born_1981)" title="Maxwell (footballer, born 1981)">Maxwell</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mark_van_Bommel" title="Mark van Bommel">Van Bommel</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Dirk_Kuyt" title="Dirk Kuyt">Kuyt</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Afonso_Alves" title="Afonso Alves">Alves</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/John_Heitinga" title="John Heitinga">Heitinga</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Morocco" title="Morocco"><img alt="Morocco" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/15px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/23px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/30px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mounir_El_Hamdaoui" title="Mounir El Hamdaoui">El Hamdaoui</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Uruguay" title="Uruguay"><img alt="Uruguay" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/15px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/23px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/30px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Suárez</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Theo_Janssen" title="Theo Janssen">Janssen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belgium" title="Belgium"><img alt="Belgium" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jan_Vertonghen" title="Jan Vertonghen">Vertonghen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Ivory_Coast" title="Ivory Coast"><img alt="Ivory Coast" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg/15px-Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg/23px-Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg/30px-Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Wilfried_Bony" title="Wilfried Bony">Bony</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Daley_Blind" title="Daley Blind">Blind</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Georginio_Wijnaldum" title="Georginio Wijnaldum">Wijnaldum</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Davy_Klaassen" title="Davy Klaassen">Klaassen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Morocco" title="Morocco"><img alt="Morocco" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/15px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/23px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/30px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Karim_El_Ahmadi" title="Karim El Ahmadi">El Ahmadi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Morocco" title="Morocco"><img alt="Morocco" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/15px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/23px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2c/Flag_of_Morocco.svg/30px-Flag_of_Morocco.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Hakim_Ziyech" title="Hakim Ziyech">Ziyech</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Matthijs_de_Ligt" title="Matthijs de Ligt">De Ligt</a></span></li></ul>

<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <a href="/wiki/Gary_Lineker" title="Gary Lineker">Lineker</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a href="/wiki/Chris_Waddle" title="Chris Waddle">Waddle</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a> </span></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Template:Premier League Player of the Season"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Template talk:Premier League Player of the Season"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Premier_League_Player_of_the_Season" title="Premier League Player of the Season">Premier League Player of the Season</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Alan_Shearer" title="Alan Shearer">Shearer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Denmark" title="Denmark"><img alt="Denmark" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/15px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/23px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9c/Flag_of_Denmark.svg/30px-Flag_of_Denmark.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="387" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Peter_Schmeichel" title="Peter Schmeichel">Schmeichel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Juninho_Paulista" title="Juninho Paulista">Juninho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Michael_Owen" title="Michael Owen">Owen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Trinidad_and_Tobago" title="Trinidad and Tobago"><img alt="Trinidad and Tobago" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/15px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/23px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg/30px-Flag_of_Trinidad_and_Tobago.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Dwight_Yorke" title="Dwight Yorke">Yorke</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Phillips_(footballer)" title="Kevin Phillips (footballer)">Phillips</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Patrick_Vieira" title="Patrick Vieira">Vieira</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Sweden" title="Sweden"><img alt="Sweden" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/15px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/23px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4c/Flag_of_Sweden.svg/30px-Flag_of_Sweden.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1600" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Freddie_Ljungberg" title="Freddie Ljungberg">Ljungberg</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Netherlands" title="Netherlands"><img alt="Netherlands" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">van Nistelrooy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Frank_Lampard" title="Frank Lampard">Lampard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France" title="France"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal" title="Portugal"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Serbia" title="Serbia"><img alt="Serbia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/ff/Flag_of_Serbia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Serbia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Nemanja_Vidi%C4%87" title="Nemanja Vidi">Vidi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Rooney" title="Wayne Rooney">Rooney</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Uruguay" title="Uruguay"><img alt="Uruguay" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/15px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/23px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/30px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belgium" title="Belgium"><img alt="Belgium" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/15px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/30px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Eden_Hazard" title="Eden Hazard">Hazard</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/England" title="England"><img alt="England" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/15px-Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/23px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/30px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Jamie_Vardy" title="Jamie Vardy">Vardy</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Hakim_Ziyech" title="Hakim Ziyech">Ziyech</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FIFA_Club_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FIFA_Club_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" title="Template:FIFA Club World Cup Golden Ball"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:FIFA_Club_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" title="Template talk:FIFA Club World Cup Golden Ball"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:FIFA_Club_World_Cup_Golden_Ball&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="FIFA_Club_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/FIFA_Club_World_Cup" title="FIFA Club World Cup">FIFA Club World Cup</a> <a href="/wiki/FIFA_Club_World_Cup_awards" title="FIFA Club World Cup awards">Golden Ball</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">199697: <a href="/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">200203: <a href="/wiki/Roy_Makaay" title="Roy Makaay">Makaay</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">200405: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">200506: <a href="/wiki/Luca_Toni" title="Luca Toni">Toni</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">200607: <a href="/wiki/Francesco_Totti" title="Francesco Totti">Totti</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">200809: <a href="/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">200910: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201011: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">201213: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201314: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a> &amp; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201415: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201516: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201617: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201718: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201819: <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Messi" title="Lionel Messi">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">201920: <a href="/wiki/Ciro_Immobile" title="Ciro Immobile">Immobile</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Eredivisie_top_scorers" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Eredivisie_top_scorers" title="Template:Eredivisie top scorers"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Eredivisie_top_scorers" title="Template talk:Eredivisie top scorers"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Eredivisie_top_scorers&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Eredivisie_top_scorers" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Eredivisie" title="Eredivisie">Eredivisie</a> <a href="/wiki/Eredivisie#Top_scorers" title="Eredivisie">top scorers</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1957: <a href="/wiki/Coen_Dillen" title="Coen Dillen">Dillen</a> </span></li>

<li>2016&#8211;17: <a href="/wiki/Real_Madrid_CF" title="Real Madrid CF">Real Madrid</a></li>
<li>2017&#8211;18: <a href="/wiki/Edinson_Cavani" title="Edinson Cavani">Cavani</a></li>
<li>2018&#8211;19: not awarded</li>
<li>2019&#8211;20: <a href="/wiki/Leicy_Santos" title="Leicy Santos">Santos</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Aldo_Rovira_Trophy" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Template:Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Template talk:Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Aldo_Rovira_Trophy" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Trofeo Aldo Rovira">Aldo Rovira Trophy</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

		<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li id="t-whatlinkshere"><a href="/wiki/Special:WhatLinksHere/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="List of all English Wikipedia pages containing links to this page [j]" accesskey="j">What links here</a></li><li id="t-recentchangeslinked"><a href="/wiki/Special:RecentChangesLinked/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" rel="nofollow" title="Recent changes in pages linked from this page [k]" accesskey="k">Related changes</a></li><li id="t-upload"><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:File_Upload_Wizard" title="Upload files [u]" accesskey="u">Upload file</a></li><li id="t-specialpages"><a href="/wiki/Special:SpecialPages" title="A list of all special pages [q]" accesskey="q">Special pages</a></li><li id="t-permalink"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;oldid=1012593025" title="Permanent link to this revision of this page">Permanent link</a></li><li id="t-info"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;action=info" title="More information about this page">Page information</a></li><li id="t-cite"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Special:CiteThisPage&amp;page=Luis_Su%C3%A1rez&amp;id=1012593025&amp;wpFormIdentifier=titleform" title="Information on how to cite this page">Cite this page</a></li><li id="t-wikibase"><a href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Special:EntityPage/Q26517" title="Structured data on this page hosted by Wikidata [g]" accesskey="g">Wikidata item</a></li></ul>
